meaningMnemonic: A <radical>sweet</radical> <radical>woman</radical> sits under a <radical>tree</radical> and works as a <kanji>mediator</kanji>. If you're having a fight with someone, bring them to the sweet woman under the tree and she'll mediate for the two of you. Problem solved! Thanks sweet lady!
readingMnemonic: You go to pay the woman for being your <kanji>mediator</kanji> for you two but she just says, "<reading>Bye</reading> ばい)." You try to hand her some money and she stares into your eyes. "Bye." Oh... okay, bye then.
